product_meta.title: The North Face Youth Recon Squash School Backpack
feature_bullets: RECON FOR KIDS. Half the size of our adult Recon backpack, this 17-liter youth daypack fits standard 9.5" x 12" folders. Side mesh water bottle pockets double as treasure-keepers and a sternum strap offers comfortable carrying.
EXTRA SUPPORT. Great to help little learner's support their books and supplies, this backpack features a comfortable stitched-foam back panel for extra cushioning.

TOTAL ORGANIZATION. External zippered pockets store smaller trinkets and treasures and mesh water bottle pockets can double as extra storage. An internal name label helps them keep track of their bag.

COMFORTABLE CARRY. Ideal for kids age six to ten, this backpack has a top handle for easy grabbing and the breakaway sternum strap is designed specifically for kids. Reflective details stand out in low light.
TECHNICAL SPECS. Dimensions. 16" X 11.5" X 6" (40.6 cm X 29.2 cm X 15.2 cm). Volume. 17 Liters. Fabric: 600D Polyester.
